name: Basket Brawl DX
description: Embark on a quest with Himari and her friends! Traverse 40+ rooms, unlock characters, and groove to chiptune tunes in this speedy platformer.

name: The Sims 4: Cozy Bistro Kit
description: Stop by your favorite hole-in-the-wall bistro and take in the antique ambiance of The Sims 4 Cozy Bistro Kit.

name: The Sims 4: Riviera Retreat Kit
description: Bask in the rustic scenery surrounding your secluded, peaceful pool with The Sims 4 Riviera Retreat Kit.

name: Koishi Adventure: Barrage Forbidden - Scarlet!
description: Twenty years ago, a red mist mutation occurred in Lotusland, Hakurei Reimu traveled to quell the revolt! This time Reimu decided to take only a *machete* and her beloved yin and yang jade!

name: Ultimate Children Fun Pack Games Collection 6 in 1
description: The perfect game collection for children aged 1 to 12! Featuring 6 high-quality and educational McPeppergames titles designed specifically for kids

name: Simulation Platinum Bundle: Bus Construction Firefighting Lawn Mowing
description: The Simulation Platinum Bundle includes Construction Simulator 4, Bus Simulator City Ride, Firefighting Simulator - The Squad and Lawn Mowing Simulator. CONSTRUCTION SIMULATOR 4 Construction Simulator returns to Nintendo Switch!

name: Operation Scorpion: Take Down
description: A single-player FPS game that fights against terrorists around the world! Defeat your enemies and get your weapons! Weapons that excite military fans!

name: Boing Boing
description: An exciting bouncy experience! Combine delights to create bigger and sweeter ones. Aim for the pudding!

name: Sugoi Girls: Lovely Wife
description: Meet over 50 pretty anime girls in this relaxing puzzle game!

name: Arcade Archives: Cue Brick
description:
"CUE BRICK" is a puzzle game released by KONAMI in 1989.
The goal is to move the bricks that make up the ground to form a path for all of the balls to follow. There's no escaping this game once you get hooked. It has a total of 101 thrilling puzzles ready to entrance your brain!

name: Project: Emplorer
description: You are the pilot of a micro-robot that travels through tissues, collecting 'samples' from the cells it kills and harvesting samples more efficiently.

name: Catan: Console Edition - Complete Collection
description: Gather your friends and family together for the CATAN: Complete Collection! This definitive edition includes the core game of CATAN, the strategic depth of The Helpers expansion, and the captivating complexity of Cities & Knights. Whether you're a seasoned player or a newcomer to the world of CATAN, this comprehensive collection guarantees endless hours of thrilling competition, cunning negotiation, and strategic conquest. Elevate your tabletop adventures to new heights and forge your path to victory with the Complete Collection of CATAN.

name: Dream Addict
description: Dream Addict is an action RPG set in a dream world. Battle animals and monsters with swords and skills to earn "Battle Memories." Use these at your base to unlock new abilities. Strengthen yourself as you explore the dreams. What lies at the end of your dream addiction?

name: Candy Roller
description: Control ball in this 3d ball game. Try to collect all keys to unlock finish before time ends and also collect cakes in every level. Be a master ball controller

name: Brick Storm
description: Enter the world of Brickorium, an exhilarating rogue-lite brick-breaker game! Take on increasingly challenging waves of bricks, earn gold, and unlock a variety of bonuses to enhance your abilities. Test your reflexes in this thrilling arcade challenge where every playthrough is unique.

name: Bridges of Patience
description: A single-player Third Person Parkour game where you, as a pirate, try to pass levels by overcoming challenges such as moving bridges (you'll see others in the game).

name: Spark
description: You are Spark, an animated and bright bundle of energy. Through exploring an electronic maze in the depths of a computer, you come to understand your purpose in life of bringing connection, vitality, and exuberance to those around you. Spark: Virtue Through Voltage.

name: Shopping Simulator
description: "Shopping Simulator" is your ticket to a virtual mall adventure! Dive into diverse stores, manage budgets, and make friends in this nostalgic Scratch-style game. Ready to shop 'til you drop? Let's go!

name: Maze TD Battleground
description: Use your towers to build a maze to kite the enemies to make more damage. But don't block their way or they will go aggro on you! Use the checkpoints to have the enemies walk longer routes through your maze. Build your own maps in the map editor.

name: Epic Quest
description: Epic Quest is a singleplayer game stylized after classic 8-bit JRPG games of the 1980s. You are tasked with defeating the dreadful Disciple of Antisexuality. Explore a mysterious world, recruit mercenaries into your party, and fight terrible monsters!

name: Intimate Abode
description: "Discover a unique experience of self-discovery and pleasure in the game 'Intimate Abode'. Explore your apartment and enjoy intimate moments in different locations, trying out different dildos and dildos. Release your sensuality and immerse yourself in a journey of personal pleasure."

name: Elfengard Hunter Slayer
description: Welcome to the world of Elfengard. You will follow the journey to discover how the hero ended up in this fantasy world full of monsters.

name: Ghostein
description: Guide a boy, hide him and escape from the Nazi camp using posters! Ghostein is a short stealth game. You control the ghost of the father, who died in the gas chamber, who returns to save his son from the same fate. With the posters you give the command that the boy needs to do.

name: Xuan Yuan Sword Mystic RPG Bundle
description: From classic to modern, enjoy two beautiful stories in one amazing RPG bundle!

name: SkateCat
description: Embark on a purr-fect 8-bit adventure with SkateCat, the ultimate platformer game where you step into the paws of a fearless feline skater!

name: Casual Puzzles Bundle 8 in 1
description: Eight great casual puzzle games in one bundle!

name: Medieval Lords
description: Forge your dynasty in a medieval world, where strategy, economy, and legacy intertwine.

name: Cazzarion: Star Collector
description: Sin descripción

name: Cyber Commander: Zombie Revenge
description: Cyber commander: Zombie Revenge is an exciting game in the Tower Defense genre. Build ingenious lines of defense to withstand the next onslaught of monsters. Will you have enough strategic skills to survive another night?

name: From Them
description: A short first person wave defense surrounding mutant creatures invading your town. Collect materials and fire power from the hardware and gun store, build traps to defend yourself, and survive 6 nights. Comes with Unreal Engine 5 project files.

name: Northgard: Garm, Clan of the Hounds
description: The Sons of Ragnarök, as they have come to be known, are indeed as destructive as the event their past leader, Hvedrung, worked so hard to unleash. Freed from the gods' restrictions, they might indeed be the nightmare Northgard feared…

name: Necromancia
description: NECROMANCIA! A skele-puzzle type game where your bones and your wit may guide ye through the delving of the dungeons and catacombs. Take command of your undead hordes and collect the spreads to form the ultimate sandwich!! The only brain your minions will be eating is yours!

name: Picross S Namco Legendary Edition
description: A collaboration between Picross S and the Namco LEGENDARY Series! A second character editor has been added to the Nintendo Switch version of Picross S! Namco LEGENDARY Series characters are now available as Picross puzzles.

name: Project Kinesis
description: Project Kinesis is a video game that blends card game combat, dice rolling, and collectable elements. Start by selecting your initial faction, then advance through each story chapter, collecting powerful cards to enhance your abilities.

name: Poseidon
description: Poseidon wants to return his beloved golden sharks back to the Greek seas, go to a small island and help God find his subjects!)

name: Mage vs. Castle
description: You need to concentrate, dodge everything that moves and avoid touching the edges.

name: Frog 'n' Roll
description: Roll around as a cute little frog, shoot waves of bugs and upgrade your weapons in this arcade shooter, Frog 'n' Roll!

name: Brain Puzzles Bundle 12 in 1
description: 10 great brain puzzle games in one bundle!

name: Death Education
description: Immerse yourself in the atmosphere of an old abandoned Soviet school and find out what's going on inside its walls from the first person in the new psychological horror Death Education. But be careful, something is already watching you.

name: Fallopian Frenzy! Come Again?
description: Ten years ago (2014) I made my first game. This is that game. Mostly intact. I'm sorry.

name: Cook 'Til Escape: Nyanzou & Kumakichi - Escape Game
description:
1200 kinds of dishes in total
Combine various tools and materials

name: Saihate Station
description: A love and hate bromance exploration horror ADV that depicts the codependency and perverted love between two men.

name: Back Fire
description: Back Fire is a full motion video gunfight action adventure game. In the game, players need to make their own choices, which will affect the progression of the plot. The final endings of the story will be different, and the secret hidden in the world of “Back Fire” will be revealed.

name: Let's Throoow! Street Basketball Simulator
description: Get ready for an exciting sports adventure in a basketball simulator with realistic ball physics!

name: Jelly Battle
description: A simple pet care sim with puzzle-style battles! Take care of your jelly – feed it, play with it, clean it, customize it, and guide it through battles with other jellies!

name: MudRunner VR
description: The Ultimate Off-Road Experience In VR - Face the challenges of harsh weather and terrain in fully immersive VR for the first time! Tackle treacherous mud, fierce rivers, rocky paths, and more, to reach your goals.

name: Guilty Gear: Strive - Additional Battle Stage: Amber Fest with Kind Neighbors
description: The additional battle stage "Amber Fest with Kind Neighbors" becomes selectable in-game.

name: Guilty Gear: Strive - Additional Character 13: Slayer
description: Adds Slayer to the roster of playable characters

name: The Last Warmage
description: The Last Warmage is a fast-paced, new take on Tower Defense where mana management and strategic spellcasting are crucial. The main campaign follows the story of the dark elf Yoradhin, expanded with a variety of side quests.

name: Ninja Kamui: Shinobi Origins
description: Power up with special "TYPE 0" boost gear and annihilate the forces of evil in this captivating arcade-style ninja action game! Delve into and experience the mysterious "beginning" untold in the original anime.

name: GeoMaze
description: Hexaspherical geo-spatial puzzle game.

name: Fetish Club
description: From Leather to Chains: Explore Every Fetish Fantasia in Fetish.

name: Trading Towns
description: Trading Towns Idle is a simple and relaxing economic game in which you have to find ways to make money.

name: Flathead
description: Flathead is a psychological horror puzzle game developed by Tim Oxton. Players will wager their lives in a game of Over or Under. Gain enough points to buy your freedom, but nightmares lurk in the dark, and negative outcomes will occur if not enough points are banked.

name: Cellular Survival
description: Cellular Survival is an action shooter with heavy Rogue-like elements. Choose your path, equip yourself, and push forward and overcome the perils that stand in the way of your survival. The fate of the microscopic realm rests in your hands.

name: A Cat & His Boy
description: Leif, the little boy, is feeling a bit sad since that happened. Take on the role of Midnight, the mischievous cat, and help your human friend through a rough time in his life.

name: Angry Penguin
description:
Angry Penguin is a challenging platformer with numerous and varied trials, where every step is a difficulty.
The game features an integrated timer, so no need to worry about LiveSplit when you want to start a playthrough!
Will you be able to collect all the hidden eggs ?

name: Madzik
description: Smash Your Path to Destiny! Embark on a narrative-driven hack and slash adventure infused with a nostalgic '80s vibe. In the ever-shifting world of Zikverländ, every creature undergoes formidable transformations, providing a thrilling and dynamic challenge through perilous moons.

name: Forest Showdown: Cat Hero Battle
description: This is a unique VR game that allows you to experience the joy of the wandering of pet cats in the forest. In the dense forest, your pet cat will interact with various animals to start a thrilling adventure.

name: Survival Of Exon
description: In Survival of Exon, strategic combat is key. Eliminate foes to collect coins and upgrade your character, becoming a force to be reckoned with. As the difficulty ramps up, you'll need to strategically enhance your gear to overcome the onslaught and emerge victorious.

name: Insect Flight Simulator VR
description: This is a casual VR game that simulates insect flights, which immersed players in the beautiful world of insects. In the game, players can control the flying trajectory of the butterfly through the handle and feel the thrill of insects soaring the sky.

name: Baisu
description: Step into the shoes of Detective Clay Kriest in "Baisu," a chilling tale of family, art, and the haunting unknown. As you arrive at the secluded residence of Maple Street 22, responding to an eerie call for help, you'll find yourself immersed in a quest shrouded in darkness.

name: Find True Love or Hell!
description: First-person perspective through role-playing When getting along with the "Destined Heroine", they constantly make choices to deepen mutual understanding, and strive to exchange sincerity for true love. These choices determine the final emotional outcome. In the end, who will Huang Di's true love be

name: Coyote: An Old West Vignette
description: Coyote: An Old West Vignette is a tiny point-and-click adventure game about a gruff marshall on the trail of a deadly outlaw.

name: Dave the Diver: Anniversary Edition
description:
Dave the Diver is an action-adventure and management simulation game developed by Mintrocket. In the game, players control Dave, who spends his days diving into underwater environments to catch fish and gather resources, and his nights managing a sushi restaurant. The gameplay combines real-time underwater exploration and combat with restaurant management mechanics.

This edition, released exclusively in Japan in physical format, features an exclusive Guilty Gear: Strive crossover with content including boat skins of the various fighters, cosplayers appearing as customers at Bancho Sushi, May's theme song The Disaster of Passion in the rhythm mini-game and May's anchor appearing as a melee weapon during dives.

name: Folie Fatale
description: All capture targets are mentally "Jirai"(landmine)!? Meet these eccentric boys, reveal the truth beneath in this Psycho-love-horror VN!

name: Vox Populi: Europa 2024
description: Play as an existing or fully customizable political figure, and campaign for many alternative European elections! In "Vox Populi: Europa 2024", you and the characters around you must promote your ideas and your popularity throughout the continent to claim victory!

name: Shotengai 10
description: Suddenly, I realized that I was in a Japanese shopping district that I was unfamiliar with. An unusual shopping street where even if you proceed blindly, you will end up returning to the entrance. Let's exit from this shopping street by relying on the hints left behind.

name: Sakura Hime 4
description: Adorable nekomimi, enchanting sorceresses, and stunning girls from a different realm have enveloped you. Aim to be the most devoted caretaker and have a wonderful vacation with them!

name: Potion Permit: Complete Edition
description: Moonbury's residents need healing, and you're the best chemist around! With your trusty tools, a brewing cauldron, and a canine companion at your side, you'll need to diagnose symptoms, gather ingredients, brew potions, and cure ailments in this open-ended sim RPG.

name: Tabletop Hero
description: is a roguelike deck-building game. With a variety of heroes and classes, hundreds of cards and treasures, and a rich array of genres to explore, there's plenty to discover. Additionally, card enchantment and fusion mechanics help you build a stronger deck.

name: Psych//Shift
description: Psych//Shift is a unique take on the fast and frenetic First-Person Shooter/Parkour formula. With one core mechanic at its center, the ability to instantaneously swap minds with nearly any enemy you choose. Taking on both their current position and also their characteristics.

name: Impact Trial: First Encounter
description: Embark on a sci-fi story and survive the enemies! Impact Trial: First Encounter is a mixture of bullet hell and adventure game with rogue-lite elements, where your choices influence the story and the hundreds of enemies that are thrown at you.

name: Super Valis IV
description: A Demon Horde appears from the Red Moon. The bell of battle rings...

name: Valis III
description: The battle for everything begins!

name: Valis: The Fantasm Soldier II
description: Sin descripción

name: Mugen Senshi Valis
description: Will you be able to see the true last scene?!

name: Mugen Senshi Valis
description: The legend of the Valis Warrior begins here.

name: StrayShot
description:
StrayShot is a thrilling free-to-play third-person shooter game where you step into the boots of a Bounty Hunter, and take on rivals in intense matches in several game modes.
Team up with friends or go solo to fight other players in an epic battle for survival and earn exclusive rewards.

name: The Mouse The Merrier
description: The Mouse the Merrier is a cozy puzzle game about reuniting a mouse with his lost family. Traverse through a beautiful flooded landscape, sliding along floating petals and hopping onto buttons. Help Mousimus find his family and try your best not to leave anymouse behind!

name: Dino
description: A collection of 2D games built in one project, an open-source monorepo. The games mostly start as jam submissions, but are growing to cover a range of genres, including metroidvania platforming, top-down adventuring, beat-em-up action, puzzles, runners, and more! Dino is built with Godot.

name: Blocks and Bones
description: Blocks and Bones is a zombie wave shooter with endless hordes of the undead in custom maps built by players. Build mode is the sandbox side of the game where you build levels from blocks and publish them online in-game so other players can survive the apocalypse inside your chilling creations.

name: Cozynauts
description: Start your own space colony! Explore the unknown planet and make use of diverse resources each biome can offer. Build, craft, farm, fish, discover alien creatures and mysteries in the mines. Meet interesting individuals. And if you still feel lonely, invite a friend to join the fun in a co-op!

name: WiZmans World ReTry
description: This is a remaster of Jaleco’s RPG WiZmans World released in 2010 on Nintendo DS, now in HD with a 16:9 screen ratio.

name: Creepy Tale: Some Other Place
description: Creepy Tale is a mysterious quest rich in riddles and eerie atmosphere. An autumn morning promised a quiet fishing trip, but events took our hero to "some other place." Find the way home, uncover loads of secrets, and save everyone that you can.

name: Astor: Blade of the Monolith
description:
Journey across Gliese, a mystical world under threat by dark forces in this vibrant, action RPG. Aided by a mysterious presence, embark on a dangerous adventure with the power of the Runic Swarm in your hands. Crush the minions of evil on your path to fulfill your destiny and become the planet’s savior.

Aided by a mysterious presence, embark on a dangerous adventure with the power of the Runic Swarm in your hands. Crush the minions of evil on your path to fulfill your destiny and become the planet’s savior.

Play as Astor—a young Diokek engaged in a fight for his world’s survival as he attempts to unearth the secrets of the past. Learn new abilities, gain magical powers, and collect legendary weapons on your quest to stop an unholy ritual.

name: Fallen Force
description: Rogue-lite arena shooter, where you kill monsters by knocking them out of arena. Shoot them, punch them, freeze them, burn them and much more in this unique take on a genre.

name: Agents of SomeCompany
description: Unleash your speedrunning skills and complete your missions as fast as you can in this first-person parkour platformer. Speed through the low-poly world and compete with other players to prove you're SomeCompany's best agent.

name: Tiny Terry's Turbo Trip
description: Terry wants to become instantly famous by launching himself into space using his new car. Doing something this cool and reckless will surely make him the talk of the town.

name: Stages of Life
description: Follow the journey of a girl from childhood to old age in "Stages of Life," an exciting puzzle-adventure game. Overcome challenges and reflect on your choices in a vibrant world with an inspiring soundtrack. Try it now and discover the meaning of life!

name: Umbraclaw
description: Find hope in death. In Umbraclaw, take control of Kuon, a cat who dies in the mortal world and awakens in the Soulplane, the world of the dead. Brave the horrors of the underworld to reunite Kuon with his owner in this 2D action-adventure game.

name: Tokyo Psychodemic
description: Through forensic investigation, confront paranormal phenomenas! 2D × Cinematic・Realistic forensics investigation simulation game.

name: Fallen Survivors
description: Rogue-lite arena shooter, where you kill monsters by knocking them out of arena. Shoot them, punch them, freeze them, burn them and much more in this unique take on a genre.

name: The Black Within
description: The Black Within is a single-player first-person psychological horror. When selling her soul for fame and fortune, Laila Rose faces the consequences of her actions. A tale of Greed, fear, and change.

name: Heralds of the Avirentes: Ch. 1 - Wings of Change
description: Heralds of the Avirentes is a visual novel, which brings you into the “Crystal punk” fantasy setting, where the world of Nanraas in which the dragon race lives. The game combines a visual novel, role-playing game elements, social simulator, a turn-based combat system.

name: LEGO Hill Climb Adventures
description:
Set off on a grand adventure as you brave the hills in LEGO Hill Climb Adventures, a single player exploration game combining the vast, unique worlds of LEGO and Hill Climb Racing!
Select from a variety of Hill Climb Racing and LEGO vehicles and climb the classic Climb Canyon hills! Using the familiar, fun gameplay of Hill Climb Racing, this brand new game adds twists and extra depth to the beloved gameplay formula with the addition of exploration, adventures and stories for you to discover!

name: CatSacks
description: CatSacks is a cozy hidden object game of fuzzy friends with a little twist of Rube Goldbergesque puzzle solving fun. Click, slide, & spin objects to find hidden cats & other animals in four catastical worlds. Cat finds lovingly voiced by my real life kitties & friend's floofs!

name: Hellcome
description: Hellcome is a Multiplayer Roguelite Shooter designed for 1-4 players who want challenging experiences. Play with various characters, team up with your friends and unlock new abilities to stay alive. But watch out; it features no auto-aim, so get ready for true test of your skill and reflexes.

name: Scholar's Mate
description: Scholar's Mate is an immersive first-person horror experience that puts you in the shoes of Judith, a young woman who wakes up in the gloomy facilities of a psychiatric hospital.

name: Hood Story: Kaito Yamazaki
description: Play as "Kaito Yamazaki" a young Japanese delinquent from the underprivileged Kamagasaki district of Osaka. He will have to juggle love, friendship and violence to get his life back on track.

name: Banner of Blood
description: This medieval fantasy base-building game allows you to lead your warriors to traverse randomly generated battlefields. Reinforce the capital against the orcs' invasion.

name: Overbowed
description: Explore a kingdom overrun by evil magic as you fight foes with your own magical bow.

name: Sex Instructor Yoga
description: Yoga club for women only with one exception - you are the lucky one guy but you have to pay for your membership... and it's not money... Sex instructor yoga is a porn game created only for adults in virtual reality technology.

name: The Dark Way
description: The Game Revolves around a person who had an accident on a road and around a mysterious village find out by yourself what is happening!

name: Echostasis
description: An exploration of reality, technology, and our relationship to both - [ECHOSTASIS] offers an ever-evolving narrative that tells a story only possible through the medium of games.

name: Arcus Chroma
description: Say goodbye to jumping and hello to intense, lightning-fast grounded battles! Arcus Chroma is an offline juggle combo fighting game where dodging and countering are the keys to victory. With a truly unique cast to choose from, let your mind run wild as you master the game's creative combo system.

name: Skald: Against the Black Priory
description:
Skald: Against the Black Priory is a classic, turn-based RPG. It's set in a dark and gritty fantasy universe: full of tragic heroes, violent deaths and eldritch, Lovecraftian horror.

With a dark, immersive plot and inspired by legendary titles such as Ultima and the gold box series, this is my love letter to classic roleplaying.

It is a tile and turn based roleplaying game where you lead a party of up to six characters on an epic and perilous quest.

name: Trans-Siberian Railway Simulator
description: Get behind the wheels of classic Russian locomotives and check if the wild animals, bad people, severe frosts and constantly changing weather are able to stop you. Try to survive in the longest railway line in the world!

name: MechaLeague
description:
Humanity have colonised Mars and taken the first steps to becoming an interplanetary species.
Win asteroid mining rights and glory in zero-g sports arenas. Up to 6 players online in virtual reality and single player challenge modes.

name: O Reino em Outro Mundo
description: You have been transported to a procedurally generated voxel world where every decision matters. Manage resources, fight zombies and prepare for the harsh winters. Survive, build and thrive in an environment full of challenges and discoveries.

name: My Hobby: Needlework Galore - Vintage
description: Open Vintage world with relaxing Embroidery process DLC includes 20 artworks from Small to Large

name: Paper Nomad: Master Edition
description: All Paper Nomad Base features + Online game Hosting + Import\Export + XXL Maps

name: My Hobby: Needlework Galore - Household
description: A sweet home requires care. You will find the coziest embroidery patterns here with relaxing Embroidery process DLC includes 20 artworks from Small to Large

name: My Hobby: Needlework Galore - Tiny Home
description: Tiny and cozy Houses, Fantastic and beautiful now here, try to relax with calming Embroidery process DLC includes 20 artworks from Small to Large

name: Custom Order Maid 3D2: Sweet, Affectionate, and Devoted Long-lost Friend GP-01
description: "Long-lost Friend" is now compatible with the following content added in "CUSTOM ORDER MAID 3D2 It's a Night Magic + GP01." 1. Empire Life Mode

name: Custom Order Maid 3D2: Sweet, Affectionate, and Devoted Long-lost Friend GP-01fb
description: "Long-lost Friend" is now compatible with the following content added in "CUSTOM ORDER MAID 3D2 It's a Night Magic + GP01fb." ・Sexy love date play ・Happy happy morning!

name: Custom Order Maid 3D2: Sweet, Affectionate, and Devoted Long-lost Friend GP-02
description: "Long-lost Friend" is now compatible with the following content added in "CUSTOM ORDER MAID 3D2 It's a Night Magic + GP02." 1. Marriage system 2. Private maid mode 3. Empire life mode

name: College Gay Sex: Episode 4
description: An erotic VISUAL NOVEL featuring HD graphics, steamy ANIMATIONS, and realistic-looking characters. Cody’s journey as a gay college student continues with a sizzling double bang, as an ex-lover invites him and Jax to join him and his roommate for a hangout.

name: Capybaradise
description:
Capybaradise is an endless 3D stacking game for mobile and web in which you have to stack as many capybaras as possible with the help of a friendly goose.

Await the right moment and tap on the screen to let the capybara land safely ontop!

name: The Good Plague
description: Uncover a goofy medieval world and its offbeat humor. Choose your hero and challenge your friends and family through a diverse range of minigames in order to escape a plagued kingdom to safety. Playable in local multiplayer from 2 to 4 players.

name: Qullusrent3
description: Break through various gimmicks to clear the stage! Clear the stage by moving all the blocks to the designated placement. We hope you will enjoy this unique puzzle game! Try to clear them while struggling to find a breakthrough!

name: AMSCII Invasor
description:
A Basic locomotive Game for "Wild" category and out of contest for the AMSCII Compo 2024, in the spirit of basic small listing at Amstrad books and revue era.

1000 points to collect for Win and see the End Game Screen

name: Moondrop Isle
description: The Third Quadrennial Ryan Veeder Exposition for Good Interactive Fiction is proud to present MOONDROP ISLE, a textual adventure location made in collaboration by nine interactive fiction authors.

name: Capes: Supporter Pack
description: The Supporter Pack contains all DLC for Capes

name: Eureka fountains
description:
A map made by RataUnderground to test the Eureka editor.
Lost in another place, in another time... The fountains of Eureka were a citadel that could only be accessed through portals.

name: Puzzles and Pieces
description: Puzzles and Pieces is very small set of monsterless vanilla puzzle maps made by Christophine Place, and makes use of Patchtex (by Gothic) and plenty of mapping tricks and exploits. Each map is set in a small comfy environment to walk around and solve little brain teasers in.

name: Call of Duty: Modern Warfare III - Season 4
description:
A disturbing discovery can change everything. A mysterious DNA bomb has been found at Popov Power in Urzikstan, and it’s up to you and your squadmates to unlock the mystery behind this potentially devastating weapon and prevent catastrophe. While you obtain various DNA samples during the ominous Critical Countdown Event, you can also further explore the multitude of bunkers across Urzikstan, potentially unearthing new ways to exit.

The potential outbreak seeps into Multiplayer, with a worldwide assortment of core 6v6 maps, plenty of exhilarating modes, revered weapons, new perks, destructive killstreaks, and battle-ready recon and hazmat inspired gear throughout the Battle Pass, so you can stay protected while remaining deadly calm and effective. One slip-up could alter everything, so suit up, drop in, uncover the truth, and stop the threat!

name: Quest of Peril
description: Dive into the dark world of a Dying Earth, in this Idle exploration rougelike with turn based combat

name: Naruto x Boruto: Ultimate Ninja Storm Connection - DLC Pack 3
description: A DLC pack containing additional content for NARUTO X BORUTO Ultimate Ninja STORM CONNECTIONS.

name: Ludical
description:
Your soul is trapped in lines of code. What will you do?

Thanks to science you can now upload the consciousness of a human being inside a computer. The Gametoy which is the first fully immersive Video Game Console is finally out to the public! In which reality and digital video games collide. The lives of many can now last forever in a computer.

However, something goes terribly wrong with all the consoles across the entire globe. The minds of young and old have been trapped in all the machines. You the child of an employee that works at a company called "Technologic" must figure out what went wrong with the system. As you multitask beating video game levels and avoiding the dreaded rouge AIs that resemble nightmarish versions of what it is like to have a family. You will soon realize no one is to be trusted.

name: ButteredLilly's Random Quotes & Avatar Remote
description: In this clicker game, players are provided words of wisdom, inspiration and questionable humor with every click. ButteredLilly's Avatar Remote & Quote Generator features a simple mechanic where you click a button, and a new random user suggested quote is displayed on the screen.

name: Karm: Early Access Archives
description: KARM brings back '90s FPS look and feel in a lovecraftian world.

name: Idle Champions: Casual Karlach Skin & Feat Pack
description: In this pack: Unlocks the Champion Karlach (if you don't already own them) Casual Karlach Skin An Epic Feat for Karlach 7 Gold Karlach Chests 1 Guaranteed Shiny Equipment Card 6 Epic Blacksmithing Contracts 6 Epic Bounty Contracts

name: Modern Modern Chef
description:
One of the five titles in Game & Watch Gallery 2 was Chef, a game about a chef flipping food in the air with their frying pan to keep them from touching the ground. Alongside a remake of that handheld was also Modern Chef, a mini-game featuring Peach doing the same: keeping food in the air by flipping it in her frying pan. Though added challenges included aspects of cooking the food, feeding Yoshi, keeping food from burning, etc!

Modern Modern Chef is a remake of that remake! Faithfully recreated with completely hand-drawn artwork, playable with both the original gameplay style and a challenging new reaction-based game mode! Also included are several control and accessibility options plus secrets and unlockable extras!

name: Capes: King City Edition
description:
In addition to Capes, the King City Edition contains:
- The complete Supporter Pack DLC
- 8 Alternate Hero Skins: Change your outfits to battle crime with new style.
- Digital Artbook: A look behind the scenes of the game, featuring concept art and inspirations.
- 24 Wallpapers in 4K: Enjoy characters and environments in beautiful illustrated images.

name: Philosophers Lab
description: Navigate this robot's intricately designed home, immerse yourself in a calming Lo-Fi soundtrack, and interact with a rich selection of literature for relaxation and focused study in this interactive exploration experience.

Arm yourself with an arsenal of weapons, each meticulously crafted with realistic projectile dynamics, demanding strategic thinking and surgical precision to survive.

name: Our War: The Strongest Shield

name: Color Splash: Fairies

name: Limits of Intelligence

name: No Rules Box!

name: The Cyclop

name: Slice of Life
description: In this casual, first-person slicing sim, you take control of a citizen in a small town who is convinced that everything around them is cake. Use your trusty knife to slash your way through books, trees, dumpsters, and just about everything in town to prove what you know to be true: it's all cake.

name: Twizzle Puzzle: Dinosaurs

name: Above
description: ABOVE is a challenging climbing game set in a mysterious world. Reach, jump and grab on to rocks and moving objects as you pave your way through the vertical terrain. Experience a mysterious and intriguing world with gameplay that will challenge both your skills and endurance.

name: Saikko-nee to Death Game
description: This is a game about sisters who have decided to participate in a death game, and have to collect bills and deposit them into an ATM in order to survive. Explore to achieve your goals while avoiding TVs that will kill you if you see them, dangerous floating objects, and more.

name: Echoes
description: Follow the clues, question a cast of quirky witnesses and uncover the secrets of the little town of Greenhearth. Will you crack the case with your sanity intact?

name: A Loving Family
description: Join the emotional journey of "A Loving Family" as a college student returns home after his father's passing. Amidst grief, watch him and his new step-family learn to embrace differences and forge unbreakable bonds of love.

name: Lustful Apartment
description: "Lustful Apartment" is an adult visual novel game that follows the life of a young individual in an apartment complex within a small town. Filled with beautiful girls, romance, sex, and love, the game combines high-quality graphics with steamy animations, turning your wildest fantasies into reality.

name: Machorium: Muscle Aquarium Simulator
description: Machorium - Muscle Aquarium Simulator - is a relaxing idle and sandbox game where you can unwind and have fun. Use points generated by cute little decorative muscle men to unlock various items and create your ideal muscle aquarium, Machorium.

name: Wind Rider
description: Wind Rider is simple, relaxing gliding game with an endless map and Randomly generated Obstacles. A great game to fill your free time and beat your latest highest score!

name: Underpowered Night Spooks
description: Underpowered Night Spooks is a racing game that takes place in Japan in the early 1990s. Challenge a friend or an online player to a one-to-one race on tough courses where any distraction can cost your victory.

name: Strongest Imp
description: Destroy hordes of demons and become the strongest of all, if you can survive until there. In Strongest Imp you will use numerous artifacts, items, weapons and runes to build the perfect demon. Use roquelike mechanics and modify your weapons using all your creativity to break havoc in hell!

name: Flagdashers
description: Dash your way to capture the flag and bring it to your team's chest base. Choose your hero, each overflowing with cuteness and boasting unique abilities, to secure your flag. The first team to score in a best-of-five series wins.

description: "It Was Raining That Night" is an erotic visual novel that takes you on an adventure in the world of the mafia. With an engaging storyline and attractive characters, you're sure to get lost in the experience. Will you reign supreme or fall?

name: Romanticized Dreams of a Post-Apocalyptic Cowpoke

Undertake assignments, fighting off against armies of robots and creatures alike. Use an arsenal of unique skills, weapons, and items! Do you have what it takes to finish the job, mercenary?

name: Eternal Vigil

Will you rise as the ultimate defender or succumb to the shadows?

description: True Boxing VR brings real life boxing experience into Virtual Reality. With super realistic game play animations, and movements the game is designed to be as close to a real life experience as possible. You will learn the basics and tactics of boxing, and use these skills to beat the opponents.

name: Trash of the Titans
description: It's turn-based fantasy combat with trash animals. Defend your trash from invading vermin, and use your trash to upgrade your team. Think your way out of ruin by using the shape of each level to your advantage. Be creative, and try to not die.

name: Quest Master
description: Quest Master is a dungeon maker inspired by the classics that first made us love dungeon crawling. Unleash your imagination, alone or in local co-op, to make dungeons full of puzzles, traps and monsters. Upload them for others to explore and challenge yourself with other players’ creations.

name: Thriving City: Song
description: In 960 A.D., the Zhao Song Dynasty was established. As the mayor, you'll need to help the townspeople settle down, cultivate the land and expand. However, when the emperor issues a national mandate, conflicts between factions threaten city development—what strategy will you adopt?

description: Build a vast collection of Supercell characters, each bringing their own special ability to the battle. Wrestle enemies with Brawl Stars' El Primo, or spray bullets with Boom Beach's Heavy. Harvest Trees with Hay Day's Greg, or summon Skeletons with Clash's Witch!

In co-op/solo travel through history, fight with hordes of funky animals, gather resources, build towers and manage your minions. Napoleon as a frog, Caesar as a bull? Why not? You'll learn your lesson not to fall asleep in class.

description: Nine Sols is a lore rich, hand-drawn 2D action-platformer featuring Sekiro-inspired deflection focused combat, immersive storytelling, and unique Taopunk setting. Embark on a journey of Asian fantasy, explore the land once home to an ancient alien race, and follow a vengeful hero’s quest to slay the 9 Sols, formidable rulers of this forsaken realm.

New historical characters take center stage in the role of advisors, viziers, aristocrats, and courtiers. These rising stars bring their own ambitions, desires, and drives with them. Will Alcibiades change his allegiances multiple times throughout his life or will you be able to put an end to his double-dealing antics? Will you let Enlil-nadin-sumi successfully usurp the throne of Babylon? Or will Harpagus betray your ruler after a long life of service?
